properties.Name: BalanceType
properties.Description:
The type of balance (if applicable) associated with the Customer Account Balance information shown.

Ex:
- 0-30 day balance
- 31-60 day balance
- 60-90 day balance
- Current balance
- Deposited
- Available
- Settled
- On Hold
- Write-off Balance
- Average Daily Balance
- Line Of Credit
- Available Credit

Columns.Name: BalanceTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Balance Type.

Columns.Name: BalanceTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Balance Type.

Columns.Name: BalanceTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Balance Type.
